channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Burger King parent saw slower start to the year as revenue and earnings miss marks
item.description: Restaurant Brands is the latest fast-food giant to cite weak first-quarter demand.

item.title: I told my bank to fund a backdoor IRA, but my adviser left the money in the wrong account. Should I sue?
item.description: “The return value of the IRA account increased about 20% that year.”

item.title: Egg lovers can’t get a break. Vital Farms to raise prices because of tariffs.
item.description: Citing effects of tariffs, Vital Farms tells retail partners like Kroger, Target and Whole Foods that it will raise egg prices at least 10% this month...

item.title: My second wife says her 2 kids should inherit our estate, but I also have 2 kids. Is that fair?
item.description: “I will leave the $1 million inheritance I received from my parents to my biological daughters.”

item.title: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang fears losing the Chinese market. One analyst says that’s short-term thinking.
item.description: While Nvidia could get shut out of China, it has a big opportunity to grow in other international markets over time.

item.title: Best Stocks: The unique internet retailer that's cheap, trending higher and a possible trade war winner
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo of Ritholtz Wealth Management profile eBay.

item.title: Buy this outperforming fertilizer stock that has more than 20% upside, RBC says
item.description: Analyst Andrew Wong upgraded shares to outperform from sector perform.

item.title: Bank of America double upgrades this little-known eye care stock poised to pop 40%
item.description: BofA says National Vision is well-positioned against tariffs.

item.description: Individual investors put more than $1 billion into Nvidia on net over the past week.
